sources.title: Specter of the Rose (1946) Dir: Ben Hecht, Michael Chekhov - Film Noir
sources.description: Specter of the Rose is a 1946 film noir thriller film written and directed by Ben Hecht and starring Dame Judith Anderson, Ivan Kirov, Viola Essen, Michael Chekhov and Lionel Stander, with choreography by Tamara Geva, and music by George Antheil.It contains a notable performance by Michael Chekhova, nephew of the playwright Anton Chekhov, in one of his few film roles. metadata.Plot: Ballet dancer Andre Sanine (Ivan Kirov) may have murdered his first wife. A detective thinks so, and he's not the only one. Andre is charming, if a little peculiar. Haidi (Viola Essen), a ballerina, marries him. The company takes its new production on tour. But Andre's control seems to be slipping.
metadata.Actors: Judith Anderson, Michael Chekhov, Ivan Kirov
